page.title: 11MEDIA
page.content: THE LINCOLN RUTLAND AND STAMFORD MERCURY. The Stamford mercury is our local newspaper. The paper was first established in 1695 and is Britains oldest newspaper. The paper is on sale every friday and contains all the weeks local news, and is distributed all around the area. The paper contains sport, television programmes, crosswords, weddings, letters, topics and people and a classified section, plus district and countryside news. A urvey in our form found that over 80% of parents bought the paper.
